interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: Revitalizing N.M.F Intensive Hydrating Serum that treats Dull, Tired, Dry and Sensitive Skin from Manilla Natural Skincare Review Date: 2020/10/23 Store: Manilla Natural Skincare Average Rating: 3.8 Product Details: {'Skin Type': 'mature', 'Product Benefits': 'Hydration', 'Brand': 'Manilla Natural Skincare', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Recommended Uses For Product': 'Hydrating,Wrinkles', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '1.38 x 1.38 x 3.54 inches; 3.99 Ounces'} Review Text: I am a lover of high quality face serums because they soak into your skin without leaving you greasy like oils or lotions but unfortunately not all serums Are created equal. Some are packed with cheap oils and don’t truly work, well Not this one!!! This one is everything! I put it on all over my face, neck and especially under my eyes (which is my trouble spot because of little wrinkles) and this soaks in so beautiful. It hydrated that area so my makeup goes on like butter! It is a very light fresh smell- I almost don’t smell anything- which is perfect because my eyes can water so easy but not with this serum!
It’s vegan friendly too!
Manila serum is a must have in my morning routine. Review Title: Obsessed with this serum Rating: 5.0 --------------------------------------------------

Cutting Scissors Set 10 Pcs Professional Hairdressing Scissors Kit, Hair Cutting Scissors, Thinning Shears, Hair Razor Comb, Clips, Cape, Shears Kit for Home, Salon, Barber P.travel {'Brand': 'P.travel', 'Included Components': 'Scissors', 'Unit Count': '1 Count', 'Blade Material': 'Stainless Steel', 'Package Dimensions': '11.2 x 5.5 x 1.5 inches; 11.22 Ounces', 'UPC': '740646020214', 'Manufacturer': 'P.travel'} [[VIDEOID:e63684315904fe3d7cd3092a12671e7d]] This is a great kit for my household. We do touch ups in between our appointments. The cape is thin and has small ties in the back but works perfect for both my husband and I. The scissors are a little bigger so for my smaller hands I could use a little bit smaller pair but it does the trick. I also have used the cape when I dye my roots and it works great to keep me protected. profile:
**User Profile Summary:**

- **Hair Care Focus:** This user remains dedicated to personal grooming, particularly hair cutting and styling tools for home use, reflecting a DIY approach to hair care.

- **Skincare Interest:** They have expanded their interests to include facial skincare products, specifically high-quality serums, indicating a holistic approach to personal care.

- **Product Preference:** The user values comprehensive kits for hair tools and is now seeking effective solutions in skincare, demonstrating a preference for products that deliver noticeable results rather than those with superficial benefits.

- **Practicality:** Upholding a practical mindset, the user seeks functional solutions for hair and now skincare needs, appreciating items that offer versatility and effectiveness.

- **Ease of Use:** The importance of user-friendly products is consistent; they prioritize ergonomic design in tools, and similarly in skincare, they prefer serums that absorb well and enhance makeup application.

- **Multi-Use Capability:** Continues to value items that serve multiple purposes, as shown by their application of hydrating serums across various facial areas.

- **Overall Experience:** The user has reported high satisfaction with their purchases, reflecting positive interactions with brands that deliver quality, functional, and conscientious personal care products, including vegan-friendly options.

This profile indicates a detail-oriented individual who values convenience and efficacy across both hair and skincare routines, continually seeking effective ways to maintain their overall personal care regimen at home.
